title: Trump Organization on Trial for Tax Fraud
itunes:title: Trump Organization on Trial for Tax Fraud
description:
Greg Farrell, Bloomberg Senior Legal Reporter, discusses the criminal tax fraud trial of the Trump Organization, that threatens to reveal the inner workings of the real estate empire.
Randy Beck, a Professor at the University of Georgia School of Law, discusses Republican Senator Lindsey Graham's legal battle to quash a subpoena for him to testify in the Georgia criminal investigation into the 2016 presidential election.
June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
